I am sought<S>1875</S> of them that asked<S>7592</S> not<S>3808</S> for me; I am found<S>4672</S> of them that sought<S>1245</S> me not<S>3808</S>: I said<S>559</S>, Behold me, behold me, unto a nation<S>1471</S> that was not called<S>7121</S> by my name<S>8034</S>.
I have spread out<S>6566</S> my hands<S>3027</S> all the day<S>3117</S> unto a rebellious<S>5637</S> people<S>5971</S>, which walketh<S>1980</S> in a way<S>1870</S> that was not good<S>2896</S>, after<S>310</S> their own thoughts<S>4284</S>;
A people<S>5971</S> that provoketh me to anger<S>3707</S> continually<S>8548</S> to my face<S>6440</S>; that sacrificeth<S>2076</S> in gardens<S>1593</S>, and burneth incense<S>6999</S> upon altars of brick<S>3843</S>; <sup>upon: Heb. upon bricks</sup>
Which remain<S>3427</S> among the graves<S>6913</S>, and lodge<S>3885</S> in the monuments<S>5341</S>, which eat<S>398</S> swine's<S>2386</S> flesh<S>1320</S>, and broth<S>4839</S> <S>6564</S> of abominable<S>6292</S> things is in their vessels<S>3627</S>; <sup>broth: or, pieces</sup>
Which say<S>559</S>, Stand<S>7126</S> by thyself, come not near<S>5066</S> to me; for I am holier<S>6942</S> than thou. These are a smoke<S>6227</S> in my nose<S>639</S>, a fire<S>784</S> that burneth<S>3344</S> all the day<S>3117</S>. <sup>nose: or, anger</sup>
Behold, it is written<S>3789</S> before<S>6440</S> me: I will not keep silence<S>2814</S>, but will recompense<S>7999</S>, even recompense<S>7999</S> into their bosom<S>2436</S>,
Your iniquities<S>5771</S>, and the iniquities<S>5771</S> of your fathers<S>1</S> together<S>3162</S>, saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, which have burned incense<S>6999</S> upon the mountains<S>2022</S>, and blasphemed<S>2778</S> me upon the hills<S>1389</S>: therefore will I measure<S>4058</S> their former<S>7223</S> work<S>6468</S> into their bosom<S>2436</S>.
Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, As the new wine<S>8492</S> is found<S>4672</S> in the cluster<S>811</S>, and one saith<S>559</S>, Destroy<S>7843</S> it not; for a blessing<S>1293</S> is in it: so will I do<S>6213</S> for my servants'<S>5650</S> sakes, that I may not destroy<S>7843</S> them all.
And I will bring forth<S>3318</S> a seed<S>2233</S> out of Jacob<S>3290</S>, and out of Judah<S>3063</S> an inheritor<S>3423</S> of my mountains<S>2022</S>: and mine elect<S>972</S> shall inherit<S>3423</S> it, and my servants<S>5650</S> shall dwell<S>7931</S> there.
And Sharon<S>8289</S> shall be a fold<S>5116</S> of flocks<S>6629</S>, and the valley<S>6010</S> of Achor<S>5911</S> a place for the herds<S>1241</S> to lie down in<S>7258</S>, for my people<S>5971</S> that have sought<S>1875</S> me.
But ye are they that forsake<S>5800</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, that forget<S>7913</S> my holy<S>6944</S> mountain<S>2022</S>, that prepare<S>6186</S> a table<S>7979</S> for that troop<S>1409</S> <S>1408</S>, and that furnish<S>4390</S> the drink offering<S>4469</S> unto that number<S>4507</S>. <sup>troop: or, Gad</sup> <sup>number: or, Meni, a pagan god</sup>
Therefore will I number<S>4487</S> you to the sword<S>2719</S>, and ye shall all bow down<S>3766</S> to the slaughter<S>2874</S>: because when I called<S>7121</S>, ye did not answer<S>6030</S>; when I spake<S>1696</S>, ye did not hear<S>8085</S>; but did<S>6213</S> evil<S>7451</S> before mine eyes<S>5869</S>, and did choose<S>977</S> that wherein I delighted<S>2654</S> not.
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>, Behold, my servants<S>5650</S> shall eat<S>398</S>, but ye shall be hungry<S>7456</S>: behold, my servants<S>5650</S> shall drink<S>8354</S>, but ye shall be thirsty<S>6770</S>: behold, my servants<S>5650</S> shall rejoice<S>8055</S>, but ye shall be ashamed<S>954</S>:
Behold, my servants<S>5650</S> shall sing<S>7442</S> for joy<S>2898</S> of heart<S>3820</S>, but ye shall cry<S>6817</S> for sorrow<S>3511</S> of heart<S>3820</S>, and shall howl<S>3213</S> for vexation<S>7667</S> of spirit<S>7307</S>. <sup>vexation: Heb. breaking</sup>
And ye shall leave<S>3240</S> your name<S>8034</S> for a curse<S>7621</S> unto my chosen<S>972</S>: for the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S> shall slay<S>4191</S> thee, and call<S>7121</S> his servants<S>5650</S> by another<S>312</S> name<S>8034</S>:
That he who blesseth<S>1288</S> himself in the earth<S>776</S> shall bless<S>1288</S> himself in the God<S>430</S> of truth<S>543</S>; and he that sweareth<S>7650</S> in the earth<S>776</S> shall swear<S>7650</S> by the God<S>430</S> of truth<S>543</S>; because the former<S>7223</S> troubles<S>6869</S> are forgotten<S>7911</S>, and because they are hid<S>5641</S> from mine eyes<S>5869</S>.
For, behold, I create<S>1254</S> new<S>2319</S> heavens<S>8064</S> and a new<S>2319</S> earth<S>776</S>: and the former<S>7223</S> shall not be remembered<S>2142</S>, nor come<S>5927</S> into mind<S>3820</S>. <sup>come: Heb. come upon the heart</sup>
But be ye glad<S>7797</S> and rejoice<S>1523</S> for ever<S>5703</S> in that which I create<S>1254</S>: for, behold, I create<S>1254</S> Jerusalem<S>3389</S> a rejoicing<S>1525</S>, and her people<S>5971</S> a joy<S>4885</S>.
And I will rejoice<S>1523</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, and joy<S>7797</S> in my people<S>5971</S>: and the voice<S>6963</S> of weeping<S>1065</S> shall be no more heard<S>8085</S> in her, nor the voice<S>6963</S> of crying<S>2201</S>.
There shall be no more thence an infant<S>5764</S> of days<S>3117</S>, nor an old man<S>2205</S> that hath not filled<S>4390</S> his days<S>3117</S>: for the child<S>5288</S> shall die<S>4191</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>; but the sinner<S>2398</S> being an hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S> shall be accursed<S>7043</S>.
And they shall build<S>1129</S> houses<S>1004</S>, and inhabit<S>3427</S> them; and they shall plant<S>5193</S> vineyards<S>3754</S>, and eat<S>398</S> the fruit<S>6529</S> of them.
They shall not build<S>1129</S>, and another<S>312</S> inhabit<S>3427</S>; they shall not plant<S>5193</S>, and another<S>312</S> eat<S>398</S>: for as the days<S>3117</S> of a tree<S>6086</S> are the days<S>3117</S> of my people<S>5971</S>, and mine elect<S>972</S> shall long enjoy<S>1086</S> the work<S>4639</S> of their hands<S>3027</S>. <sup>shall long: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out</sup>
They shall not labour<S>3021</S> in vain<S>7385</S>, nor bring forth<S>3205</S> for trouble<S>928</S>; for they are the seed<S>2233</S> of the blessed<S>1288</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, and their offspring<S>6631</S> with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they call<S>7121</S>, I will answer<S>6030</S>; and while they are yet speaking<S>1696</S>, I will hear<S>8085</S>.
The wolf<S>2061</S> and the lamb<S>2924</S> shall feed<S>7462</S> together<S>259</S>, and the lion<S>738</S> shall eat<S>398</S> straw<S>8401</S> like the bullock<S>1241</S>: and dust<S>6083</S> shall be the serpent's<S>5175</S> meat<S>3899</S>. They shall not hurt<S>7489</S> nor destroy<S>7843</S> in all my holy<S>6944</S> mountain<S>2022</S>, saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
